alert.note: Alert for North Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:24AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL CASS COUNTY THROUGH 800 AM CDT... At 723 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Walker, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walker and Hackensack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
